Class GroundingOperator

  • Object
    • ConstraintBasedGroundingOperator
      • GroundingOperator
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    GroundingOperator

    public class GroundingOperator
extends ConstraintBasedGroundingOperator
    Extension of ConstraintBasedGroundingOperator, providing an unconstrained grounding operator with additional utility methods for simple instantiations.
    Author:
    Tobias Falke
